TopicTitle: Is there some way to tell what mod resources an asteroid has on it?

Articles.Content:
Other than a probe with one of every single kind of container. Resources are all regolith/stock (MKS, Karbonite, Karbonite plus).

I'd like to be able to send probes out to spot which asteroids I actually want to bring to my station.

Also, is there some way to have the drill automatically shut down when containers are full instead of wasting mass?

Your Surface Scanning Module should have been modified by the Community Resource Pack to give you the composition of any asteroid you're attached to. Claw on to an asteroid and right click the scanner for a percentage breakdown:
